articles.description: US and European scientists have called off a controversial balloon test flight that was to take place in Swedens far north in June, part of a disputed solar geoengineering experiment to artificially cool the planet.
articles.title: Controversial test flight aimed at cooling the planet cancelled - manilastandard.net

articles.author: Elliot Smith
articles.content:
LONDON European stocks advanced on Thursday amid a raft of data releases from the region.
The pan-European Stoxx 600 was up 0.4% during afternoon trade, with tech stocks climbing 1.6% to lead gains,… [+1863 chars]
articles.description: European stocks advanced on Thursday amid a raft of data releases from the region.
articles.title: European markets climb amid of slew of data releases; Atos down 15% - CNBC
